text: George Huntington (April 9, 1850 – March 3, 1916) was an American physician. He discovered Huntington's disease. He was born in New York City. Huntington died in Long Island, New York, aged 65. ==Other websites== *A Brief History of Huntington's Disease from HOPES: Huntington's Disease Outreach Project for Education at Stanford * 'History of Medicine Bulletin – The Johns Hopkins University' : Much more biographical information. Category:1850 births Category:1916 deaths Category:American physicians Category:Scientists from New York City
title: George Huntington
